title: The Walking Dead: Season Two
description: Download Episode One of The Walking Dead: Season Two, a five-part game series that continues the story of Clementine, a young girl orphaned by the undead apocalypse. Left to fend for herself, she has been forced to learn how to survive in a world gone mad. Many months have passed since the events seen in Season One of The Walking Dead, and Clementine is searching for safety. But what can an ordinary child do to stay alive when the living can be just as bad – and sometimes worse – than the dead? As Clementine, you will be tested by situations and dilemmas that will test your morals and your instinct for survival. Your decisions and actions will change the story around you, in this sequel to 2012’s Game of the Year.

childDownloads.title: The Walking Dead: Season 2, Ep.2, A House Divided
childDownloads.description: If you own The Walking Dead: Season Two - Season Pass, DO NOT purchase this content here as you will be charged again. The Walking Dead: Season 2, Ep. 1 – All That Remains required; sold separately. The past returns to haunt Clementine and the group after an encounter with a mysterious stranger triggers a desperate escape. Frayed tensions are pushed to breaking point, as suspicion, anger, loss and betrayal result in death.

childDownloads.title: The Walking Dead: Season 2, Ep.3, In Harm's Way
childDownloads.description: If you own The Walking Dead: Season Two - Season Pass, DO NOT purchase this content here as you will be charged again. The Walking Dead: Season 2, Ep. 1 – All That Remains required; sold separately. Captured, bloody and beaten; Clementine and her group learn what it’s like to live under the heel of a leader whose intelligence is rivaled only by his propensity for brutal violence. With escape being a priority, Clem is forced to make hard-hitting decisions in this episode.

childDownloads.title: The Walking Dead: Season Two - SEASON PASS
childDownloads.description: Buy The Walking Dead: Season 2 SEASON PASS for the best value on remaining episodes (Episodes 2-5 to be released periodically) in the 5-part series once available to download. All Season Pass content will be available by Fall 2014.  If you purchase this Season Pass, all future Season Pass content will be accessible in-game once available.
